attributes.action: force MPs to repay all expenses claimed that do not assist them in the ability to do their job
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: if an mp has claimed for items that have nothing to do with their role within parliament, such as house re-furbishment, swimming pool maintenence or any of the other irrelevant claims made, then they should be made to repay all monies claimed with immediate effect.

rejection.details: As explained in our terms and conditions: http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/terms petitions to the Number 10 site should request an action that can be taken by the Prime Minister or Government. In his role as Prime Minister, the PM cannot "force" MPs of all parties to take a particular action. We suggest you contact Parliament, contact Gordon Brown as an MP, or contact your MP.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
